name: allnighter-v2
description: A QA tool for detecting special characters in HTML content for email marketing projects

scripts.build: npm run scss && npm run minify
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.minify:js: terser js/esp-logic.js -o js/esp-logic.min.js --compress --mangle && terser js/eng-logic.js -o js/eng-logic.min.js --compress --mangle && terser js/local-storage-redirect.js -o js/local-storage-redirect.min.js --compress --mangle

author: Julián LR, Lucas Salmerón Olschansky, Julián Moreira
